page.title: 11LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {Nettleton Mines} In 1929 Nettleton mine was started.There were 8 strong horses to pull the trucks up.Iron and steel was mined out of the mines.They used dynamite to make the mine bigger.There were trucks that held 1 ton and others that held 5 tons.There were 200 workers in the mine.There was 1 train to pull some trucks in and out of the mines.There were 4 entrances.All the entrances are now bricked up.Behind the mine there is a quarry.Chalk,lime and granite were dug out of it.The mine was closed in 1955 because it was too expensive to run.
